Question: Sanming Audio Enterprise (Kunshan) Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sanming Audio Enterprise (Kunshan) Co., Ltd

Product 1

- Sonus Faber Suprema speaker system
- Priced at $750,000
- Features 2 main lute-shaped columns, 8 front-firing speakers, 2 back-firing drivers, matching elliptical subwoofers, and dual mono and fully balanced electronic crossover
- Crafted with luxurious materials including carbon fiber, wood, solid aluminum, and genuine Italian leather
- Available for order on request from the Sonus Faber website

Product 2

- FiiO R9 desktop streamer and headphone amp/DAC
- Priced at $1,499
- Supports various wired and wireless headphone connections, HDMI ARC port, SD and USB ports, optical, coaxial, and ethernet inputs, 2.4GHz/5GHz Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth 5.0
- Equipped with 8-Channel ESS Sabre ES9038PRO DACs, capable of handling full hi-res PCM audio files up to 32-bit/768kHz, native DSD512, and features MQA decoding
- Features a Full-HD 6-inch color touchscreen display, Bluetooth remote control, and expandable storage up to 2TB via SD card
Summary_cn:
三明音响企业（昆山）有限公司

产品1

- Sonus Faber Suprema音箱系统
- 售价为75万美元
- 特点包括2个主琵琶形的音柱，8个前方发声扬声器，2个背向发声驱动器，配套的椭圆形低音炮，以及双单声道和完全平衡的电子分频器
- 采用豪华材料制作，包括碳纤维、木材、实铝和意大利真皮
- 可通过Sonus Faber网站按需订购

产品2

- FiiO R9桌面串流器和耳机放大器/DAC
- 售价为1499美元
- 支持各种有线和无线耳机连接，HDMI ARC端口，SD和USB端口，光纤、同轴和以太网输入，2.4GHz/5GHz Wi-Fi和蓝牙5.0
- 配备8通道ESS Sabre ES9038PRO DAC，能够处理高分辨率PCM音频文件，最高可达32位/768kHz，本机支持DSD512，并具备MQA解码功能
- 具有全高清6英寸彩色触摸屏显示屏，蓝牙遥控器，可通过SD卡扩展存储容量，最高可达2TB
